cms.query.QueryText: UPDATE CMS_PageTemplateCategory SET CategoryChildCount = (SELECT Count(*) FROM CMS_PageTemplateCategory AS SUB WHERE SUB.CategoryParentID = CMS_PageTemplateCategory.CategoryID), CategoryTemplateChildCount = (SELECT Count(*) FROM CMS_PageTemplate AS SUB WHERE SUB.PageTemplateCategoryID = CMS_PageTemplateCategory.CategoryID)
